remarks: Transpositions over sets with at least 3 elements are not commutative, see also the remark in [Rotman] p. 28.  (Contributed by AV, 21-Mar-2019.)

pmtr3ncom $p |- ( ( D e. V /\ 3 <_ ( # ` D ) ) -> E. f e. ran T E. g e. ran T ( g o. f ) =/= ( f o. g ) ) $.
$d D f g $.
$d T f g $.
